title: COVID-19 Statistical Report
description: This is the first release by Public Health Scotland on COVID-19 data across NHSScotland.
datasetNotes: On landing page, link to dataset of on left of page under heading "Data Files".  There is an open data platform with the data.  Needs investigating
sizingNotes: Small tables with simple structures and multiple dimensions. Minimal footnotes but multiple tables on some pages.
